channel.title: Proce55ing + Axoloti
channel.description:
In fact it's just using the Axoloti's midi out, but fun to add a visual part. Or to use Processing as XY-controller, etc. Processing uses the MidiBus library (install from Sketch -> Import Library... -> Add Library... -> 'The MidiBus')
A simple etch-a-sketch type implementation using 2 pots on the Axoloti, sent over midi cc, and receiving midi thru from Processing.
[https://github.com/joaogatao/axoloti/tree/master/axo_etch_a_sketch](https://github.com/joaogatao/axoloti/tree/master/axo_etch_a_sketch)
... but now having this problem [http://community.axoloti.com/t/cannot-connect-due-to-firmware-issues-but-firmware-flashing-doesnt-seem-to-do-anything/5733](http://community.axoloti.com/t/cannot-connect-due-to-firmware-issues-but-firmware-flashing-doesnt-seem-to-do-anything/5733)

item.title: Proce55ing + Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @joaogatao joaogatao
item.description:
@joaogatao wrote:

No, the problem with my Axoloti has nothing to do with Processing.
It also did midi/out well until I used the loadbang object one time. Since then it always disconnects (after a while or going out the live mode) when there's midi/out in the patch, also without the loadbang object. Flash rescue didn't help.

EDIT: It appears to be solved with Axoloti 2.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Proce55ing + Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

Does this problem happen ONLY when you use Processing and MidiBus library?

Read full topic

In fact it's just using the Axoloti's midi out, but fun to add a visual part. Or to use Processing as XY-controller, etc.
Processing uses the MidiBus library (install from Sketch -> Import Library... -> Add Library... -> 'The MidiBus')

A simple etch-a-sketch type implementation using 2 pots on the Axoloti, sent over midi cc, and receiving midi thru from Processing.

github.com

joaogatao/axoloti

Some patches for axoloti (w/ EWI). Contribute to joaogatao/axoloti development by creating an account on GitHub.

Cannot connect due to firmware issues but firmware flashing doesn't seem to do anything Helpdesk
Hello, I am having issues connecting to my axoloti core from the desktop program. I connect to the axoloti core and I get the following errors in the log: connected invalid CPU serial number, invalid protocol?, update firmware Can't obtain signature, upgrade firmware? Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now Disconnect request Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now However, when I go to flash the firmware, I only have the option to flash (rescuâ€¦
